message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 70% and you can take 30%. If you don't like it, we can negotiate further.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair. Let's see if you agree.
I think 60/40 is too skewed towards you. I'll need a better offer. I'm thinking more like 65/35 or 66/34.
I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I need a better deal than 60/40. I'm offering 55/45. Take it or leave it.
